additional_commands.label: setname
additional_commands.about: To replace default 'visitor' name with your name

options.label: about
options.value:
Hello there! I'm Marco D'Almo, a Computer Engineering Student at Politecnico di Torino.
Currently living in Brussels, Belgium, and looking for the next challenging opportunity.

options.label: skills
options.value:
I'm specializing in Data Science & AI, but I have knowledge in Cloud Technologies, Web Development and Information Systems Security.
Proficient in Python and Machine and Deep Learning Frameworks with knowledge of Javascript, Rust, Bash scripting.

options.label: experience
options.value: I have more than 3 years of experience in the Visual Effects Industry.

options.label: projects
options.value: I've had the pleasure of working on diverse projects that showcase my skills and creativity.

data.label: E-commerce Platform
data.value: Designed and developed a dynamic e-commerce website, featuring seamless payment processing and an extensive product catalog.

data.label: Inventory Management System
data.value: Crafted an intuitive application for efficient tracking and management of inventory in warehouse environments.

data.label: Social Media Analytics Dashboard
data.value: Built a powerful tool for analyzing social media data, providing insightful reports and visualizations.

data.label: Real-time Chat Application
data.value: Developed a cutting-edge messaging app with real-time capabilities, supporting both group chats and a fun array of emojis.

options.label: contact
options.value:
Feel free to reach out! You can contact me for any inquiries or collaborations.
Email: mrcdalmo@gmail.com
GitHub: https://github.com/moDal7
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marco-dalmo/
